title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for October 2024
description: The puzzle answers throughout October 2024. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for October 2024 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here's the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer for tonight's game in October 2024. We've also got answers for the other puzzles today.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today throughout October 2024. We will also reveal the solutions for all the tossups and regular puzzles throughout tonight’s show, but we’ll highlight the final puzzle first. We’ll also share the word for the Fan Fridays sweepstakes, since this contest is still active. This month, Ryan Seacrest will continue as host for regular WoF programming while Pat Sajak will be returning as Celebrity Wheel of Fortune host when it premieres on October 14. Here are all of the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles in the month of October 2024. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Wednesday, October 23, 2024 and the categories (in parentheses) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – HUDDLE AROUND (Phrase) Tossup #1 – GOBLINS AND GHOULS (Characters) Tossup #2 – SUPPLY AND DEMAND (Phrase) Regular Puzzle #1 – THINGS THAT GO BUMP IN THE NIGHT NURSE (Before & AFTER) Regular Puzzle #2 – DEADPOOL & WOLVERINE (Movie Title) Regular Puzzle #3 – MEDIEVAL VILLAGES (Places) Tossup #3 – WHEELBARROW RACE (Fun & Games) Tossup #4 – RELAY RACE (Fun & Games) Tossup #5 – THREE-LEGGED RACE (Fun & Games) Regular Puzzle #4 – WICKED THE MUSICAL (Showbiz) Here are the puzzle answers for Tuesday, October 22: Bonus Round Puzzle – YOU WEAR IT WELL (Phrase) Tossup #1 – A QUIET PLACE (Movie Title) Tossup #2 – HOT COMMODITY (Thing) Regular Puzzle #1 – TRANSFORMING INTO A WEREWOLF (What Are You Doing?) Regular Puzzle #2 – LOCH NESS MONSTER MASH (Before & After) Regular Puzzle #3 – FOOD & WINE FESTIVAL (Event) Tossup #3 – BOBSLEDDING (Fun & Games) Tossup #4 – BOBBLEHEAD DOLL (Fun & Games) Regular Puzzle #4 – PURPLE RAIN PURPLE RAIN (Song Lyrics) As a reminder, the Fan Friday sweepstakes is still taking place. We’ll post the word you need to enter for the contest here when the Friday, October 25 episode airs later this week. The word for the October 18 episode is CANADA.
html:
Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today throughout October 2024. We will also reveal the solutions for all the tossups and regular puzzles throughout tonight’s show, but we’ll highlight the final puzzle first. We’ll also share the word for the Fan Fridays sweepstakes, since this contest is still active. This month, Ryan Seacrest will continue as host for regular WoF programming while Pat Sajak will be returning as Celebrity Wheel of Fortune host when it premieres on October 14. Here are all of the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles in the month of October 2024.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Wednesday, October 23, 2024 and the categories (in parentheses) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – HUDDLE AROUND (Phrase)
  • Tossup #1 – GOBLINS AND GHOULS (Characters)
  • Tossup #2 – SUPPLY AND DEMAND (Phrase)
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – THINGS THAT GO BUMP IN THE NIGHT NURSE (Before & AFTER)
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – DEADPOOL & WOLVERINE (Movie Title)
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – MEDIEVAL VILLAGES (Places)
  • Tossup #3 – WHEELBARROW RACE (Fun & Games)
  • Tossup #4 – RELAY RACE (Fun & Games)
  • Tossup #5 – THREE-LEGGED RACE (Fun & Games)
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – WICKED THE MUSICAL (Showbiz)

Here are the puzzle answers for Tuesday, October 22:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – YOU WEAR IT WELL (Phrase)
  • Tossup #1 – A QUIET PLACE (Movie Title)
  • Tossup #2 – HOT COMMODITY (Thing)
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – TRANSFORMING INTO A WEREWOLF (What Are You Doing?)
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – LOCH NESS MONSTER MASH (Before & After)
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – FOOD & WINE FESTIVAL (Event)
  • Tossup #3 – BOBSLEDDING (Fun & Games)
  • Tossup #4 – BOBBLEHEAD DOLL (Fun & Games)
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – PURPLE RAIN PURPLE RAIN (Song Lyrics)

As a reminder, the Fan Friday sweepstakes is still taking place. We’ll post the word you need to enter for the contest here when the Friday, October 25 episode airs later this week. The word for the October 18 episode is CANADA.
